idea-plugin.name: Git Commit Template with TYPO3 Commit Guidelines
idea-plugin.description:
Create a commit message with the following template:

        [<type>] <subject>
        Breaking Changes:
        <Breaking Changes entered here>
        <BLANK LINE>
        <BLANK LINE>
        Done Tasks:
        <Tasks entered here>
        <BLANK LINE>
        To-Do:
        <To-Do's entered here>
        refs: #<Ticket number here>

action.description: Show the template for creating commit messages
